description: This file defines API routes for managing notes in a notes management system. It includes endpoints for listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes, leveraging FastAPI's APIRouter. The code interacts with a database through imported functions and maps database rows to output models.

classes.name: NoteOut
classes.description: Data model for outputting note information, including id, title, content, created_at, updated_at.

methods.name: NoteOut _row_to_note_out(row: dict)
methods.description: Converts a database row dictionary into a NoteOut model instance.

methods.name: list_notes(search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search string to filter notes by title/content"))
methods.description: Endpoint to list all notes, optionally filtered by a search string.

methods.name: create_note(payload: NoteCreate)
methods.description: Endpoint to create a new note with provided title and content.

methods.name: get_note(note_id: int)
methods.description: Retrieve a specific note by its ID.

methods.name: update_note(note_id: int, payload: NoteUpdate)
methods.description: Update the title and/or content of a note identified by ID.

ctags.name: list_notes
ctags.pattern: /^def list_notes(search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search string to filter notes by/
ctags.signature: (search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search string to filter notes by title/content"))
